column1: # CASE 1: HAU RIVER - Single Branch Model
# Scientific Justification: Merged Dinh An + Tran De mouths into equivalent
# single outlet to create stable convergence length (Lb) for Savenije solver
#   - Flow split: Jordan et al. (2019) - 40% of total Mekong discharge
# Hau Main: Chau Doc (Node 1) to Combined Mouth (Node 2)
# Length: 190 km (full estuary from border to sea)
# Width: Converges from 600m (upstream at Chau Doc) to 2300m (combined mouth)
# Depth: 12.5m (weighted average of Dinh An + Tran De)
